== The Box ==
'''this one's called the box'''

An openbox theme that uses the colors present in the default Lubuntu theme, but adds unique rounded box-shaped window buttons.
I used the colors from

<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Lubuntu/Artwork/Guidelines]]</nowiki>
